__e: I'd like to thank all of you... ..for the love and friendship - and, yes, the joy - that you have given me all these years.
Forget about what you think you know about life, friendship, and especially about you and me.
Because this is the dumping ground of friendships and it's what high school does to people!
Like us, you mean. Like us.
I mean, friendship is the most important thing in the world
Friendship is the most important thing in life.
I got a little more than the friend vibe.
You know that... I'd like to be more than friends, but you don't feel the same.
Okay, well.... lt would be fair to say that I haven't been feeling friendly toward you lately.
Now, can you put your friendship with him aside and do that for me?
Look, I know my dad's friendship means a lot to you... "but" there's a lot of other people out there who look up to you.
I don't give a shit about friendship this situation, or the past.
But we also have friendship blossoming into love.
Well, "Love is like friendship caught on fire."
You should, though, if the friendship truly matters to you.
All there is that is real is the friendship that two can share.
About the whole guys and girls befriends thing?
If there's anything left of a friendship between us, please... please end this for me.
